pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: KTAO-FM was a free-form radio station in Los Gatos, California, that existed from March, 1969, through June, 1974, and operated at 95.3 FM. The KTAO Aircheck Archives comprise audio collages with instruments played in the studio to be used as taped effects; a "jam" session recorded July 29, 1971; and an interview with Roy Rogers and Dale Evans interviewed in Los Gatos by Geoff Alexander and Don Campau, June 9, 1971, at a residence in Los Gatos, California. In addition, the collection includes images of KTAO operators and musicians in 1974; photographs of the 40th anniversary reunion; original Los Gatos business license (1974); several images of counter-culture posters; letter from Gary R. Dahl to Roger Mann.
_xcollectionFormatsxtxtxxxcollectionForm: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: More information about KTAO-FM can be found at http://www.afana.org/ktao.htm.
